text: Lion, also called khaki or lion brown, is a color that looks like the fur of a lion. The lion is a species of felid that is found in Africa and India. The word lion was first used the name of a color in English in 1551. == Other notable colors == === Lion brown === The phrase lion brown was first used as the name of a color in English in 2021. === Lion fur === Lion fur is a color that looks like khaki, but lighter. title: Lion (color)
